snippet.title: How to Play AI Arena: Inspection
snippet.description:
#aiarena #indiegame #artificialintelligence #ai #platformfighter 

Timestamps:

00:00 AI Inspector: What it is and why it matters.
00:24 Your AI's Policy: Discovering the probability of your AI taking a specific action in its state. 
00:55 Understanding your AI's Policy
02:04 How can I discover what my AI's most probable action is? 
02:54 How can I discover and manipulate what my AI will do in different scenarios?: Map toggling and Customization. 
04:01 How can I select different maps?
04:34 How can I toggle my AI's lives?
04:48 Toggling your AI's and your opponents Elemental Special Power Up
05:07 Toggling your opponents configurations
05:36 Training your AI to react to Elemental moves: How to add Projectiles
06:31 How to analyze your AI's/your opponents previous actions: Using the Action Selector
07:50 How can I start the AI Inspector tour in the game?



Socials : 

Discord - https://discord.com/invite/aiarenaplaytest
Twitter - https://twitter.com/aiarena_
Documentation Site - https://docs.aiarena.io
AI Arena Mint Pass - https://opensea.io/collection/ai-arena-mint-pass
